title: You Don't Have a Clue: Latino Mystery Stories for Teens
description: You Don't Have a Clue: Latino Mystery Stories for Teens is a groundbreaking collection of suspenseful short fiction for teens.Set in schools and communities from New York City to Venice Beach, California, the protagonists in these teen mystery stories reflect the breadth and diversity of the Latino authors included in this innovative collection. Published authors such as Mario Acevedo, Alicia Gaspar de Alba, Diana LÃ³pez and Sergio Troncoso appear alongside less well-known authors who deserve more recognition. This collection is sure to keep readers on the edge of their seats until the last page is turned.
author: Sarah Cortez
